title: Barcelona
brief_description: A practical guide for travellers intending to visit the Catalonian region of Spain. Beginning in Barcelona, host John Guerrasio provides information about public transport options, accommodation, food and currency. He visits the 1992 Olympic precinct, the Joan Miro Gallery situated on Monjuic and the Ramblas. From Barcelona, he travels to Montserrat, Tarragona, the Costa Brava and Gerona highlighting the main areas of cultural and geographic interest. Also includes a visit to Antonio Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia.
